title: China GDP: Bleak outlook for economic recovery post-virus
description: China's gloomy economic numbers are a grim warning to the rest of the world still in lockdown.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 Workers eating during lunch break at the Dongfeng Honda plant in Wuhan in China's central Hubei province
